Bambu Lab P1S

  • CoreXY high-speed architecture
  • Fully enclosed chamber
  • Automatic bed leveling
  • Remote printing via Bambu Studio & Handy
  • Compatible with AMS for multi-material printing

Bambu Lab A1 Mini

  • Bed-slinger with CoreXY-like performance
  • Automated calibration (flow, bed level, nozzle height)
  • Quiet operation with compact form factor
  • Perfect for small prototypes and detail prints
